cat: What famous people said about learning
text: Konfuzius - Tell me and I'll forget, show me and I may remember,Let me do and I'll keep it.

cat: What famous people said about learning
text: German scientist Gauss: It is not knowledge, but the act of learning, not possession but the act of getting there, which grants the greatest enjoyment.
